categoryRubrics.rule: Generally, the identifiers found within a CDA document should be unique and non-reoccurring within the same document.
Patient DOB should be valid and properly precisioned
EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient
The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology
All problem codes are should express with core subset of SNOMED codes
Problem Concern effective times reflect the appropriate problem concern status
Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text
categoryRubrics.description: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

categoryRubrics.rule: All Template Ids should be Valid with correct extension value
The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology
Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

issuesList.xmlString:
<procedure xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" classCode="PROC" moodCode="EVN">
              <templateId extension="2014-06-09" root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14"/>
              <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14"/>
              <id root="7c8040f3-c1bb-4a24-8b59-d69847714bcd"/>
              <code code="168731009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED CT" displayName="Standard chest X-ray"/>
              <statusCode code="completed"/>
              <effectiveTime>
                <low value="20120807100000+0000"/>
                <high nullFlavor="UNK"/>
              </effectiveTime>
            </procedure>

categoryRubrics.description: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

categoryRubrics.rule: All Template Ids should be Valid with correct extension value

referenceErrors.description: A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Family History Observation (V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46:2015-08-01. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).
